review: This is exactly what streaming tv should be.  Finally Google got it right -- simply connect this dongle to your TV or AV Unit (use the included extender if you dont have room), connect it to a plug (or if your tv/av has a usb port that works too) and you have a powerful streaming tool.Google is hard at work including streamcasting to various apps -- it already has most of the big names covered (google music, hulu, netflix, hbogo, plex, and youtube) as well as multiple others.  Soon this tool will also support direct streaming from android phones (as found in the API).  Technically there is no stopping what this tool can do and it takes up less room than an apple tv, roku, or other media streamer.Drawbacks?Of course there are -- 1) it doesnt let you stream (currently) from chrome on your phone -- only from your computer.  2) XBMC can not be loaded to the dongle, although this may change when android phone streaming is opened up  then you can stream directly from your supported handset.  3) not enough apps -- definitely needs to be supported more widely -- but I am sure this will happen in the future.All in all its a great product and you can not beat the price
